name: 迷离诡夜 blurred weird night
name_original: 迷离诡夜 blurred weird night
description:
Known problem solutions for DEMO:
1 Automatically switch the handle when the Bluetooth handle is inserted, if you want to operate the mouse, please unplug the Bluetooth handle
2 Some bugs are caused by reading files. Due to the large changes, the official version will be updated in the future.


game introduction:
Blurred Night, a 3D adventure game in the style of a funny horror film, made with the UNITY engine,
The scenes and folklore of the East in the early 90s are reproduced.

Synopsis:
Sending a package to the haunted house, unexpectedly, a group of people returned to 30 years ago. Various supernatural events occurred frequently.
Does the strange death indicate that we are the ones who died on the night of the murder?
How can we uncover the layers of mystery, discover the truth, and save more people back to reality?



Game Features:
- Hong Kong style funny horror movie style, so that even timid players can continue to play
- Travel back to the friendly 3D super large scene that was common in the 90s,
- More than 10 characters with different personalities will appear, and you can also gain the favor of the young lady
- Players can change the development of the plot, save NPCs, and discover the mystery
- From mysterious Asian horror legends,
- Random puzzles and prop locations
- Two ways to play: a story mode without weapons, and a zombie mode with guns
- Free dubbing by netizens or anchors at station B, thousands of dialogues will reveal the mystery for you
- Up to 6 years of production time
- Developed by only one person (poor development team)

Awards: 1st place in the bilibili independent game star audition
Another bottle of so-and-so drink (-_-!)



Tentative release date: June 16, 2022
